{"name": "Sweetwater Mission @ Friendship Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "In order to receive food all you need is the following:

Bring Proof of Residency (less than 30 days old) in the form of mail, a rent receipt, or new lease.

Provide your Photo ID

Provide proof of Children that are 17 years and under.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.sweetwatermission.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1880 Old Alabama Road Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Mableton", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30126", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.80729000000001, "longitude": -84.60025139999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 819-0662", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
